dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT OD_SC_VENDOR_NUMBER, OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME, OD_SC_VEND_TYPE, OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS, OD_SC_ACTIVATION_DATE, OD_SC_INACTIVE_DATE, OD_SC_REACTIVATE_DATE, OD_SC_AUDIT_AGENT, OD_SC_VEND_ADDRESS, OD_SC_FACTORY_NUMBER, OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME, OD_SC_FACTORY_ADDRESS, OD_SC_EUROPE_RGN, OD_SC_EU_SUB_RGN, OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO, OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO, OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS, OD_SC_EU_CONTACT, OD_SC_MEXICO_REGION, OD_SC_MX_SUB_RGN, OD_SC_MX_VEND_NO, OD_SC_MEX_FACTORY_NO, OD_SC_MX_VEND_STATUS, OD_SC_MX_CONTACT, OD_SC_ASIA_REGION, OD_SC_AS_SUB_RGN, OD_SC_AS_VEND_NO, OD_SC_ASIA_FACTORY_NO, OD_SC_AS_VEND_STATUS, OD_SC_ASIA_CONTACT, OD_SC_VEND_REGION, OD_SC_EU_VEND_NO GSO_SUPPLIER_ID, OD_SC_EU_FACTORY_NO GSO_FACTORY_ID, OD_SC_EU_VEND_STATUS GSO_SUPPLIER_STATUS FROM (SELECT * FROM q_od_pb_sc_vendor_master_v WHERE od_sc_vendor_status in ('Active','Inactive') AND ( 'ODGLB' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE OR 'ODUS' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_eu_vendor_master_v WHERE od_sc_vendor_status in ('Active','Inactive') AND ( 'ODGLB' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE OR 'ODEU' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_mx_vendor_master_v WHERE od_sc_vendor_status in ('Active','Inactive') AND ( 'ODGLB' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE OR 'ODMX' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE) UNION SELECT * FROM Q_od_sc_asia_vendor_master_v WHERE od_sc_vendor_status in ('Active','Inactive') AND ( 'ODGLB' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE OR 'ODASIA' = :P_PROFILE_VALUE) ) t1 ORDER BY OD_SC_VENDOR_NAME ,OD_SC_FACTORY_NAME ,OD_SC_VENDOR_STATUS
